resources.string:
Step 1: Open "My Account" at https://www.cardmarket.com/de/Magic/MainPage/showMyAccount

 Step 2: Scroll down to "App Details" and create a "Dedicated" App

 Step 3: Copy all credentials (or the whole page) and paste them here

Omni MTG is an Open Source Omni-Channel Solution for Magic: The Gathering. With this tool you can easily synchronise various marketplaces for Magic: The Gathering such as Cardmarket and Snapcardster by connecting the provided APIs

Omni MTG does not share any token credentials with third-parties. We shall not be liable for damages, which are caused by sole fault of any person deployed by you when using this software. Use at your own risk.

Open Source means, you can use this app free of charge and read its public source code.

If you found a bug or want to contribute to this project, write an email to: opensource@snapcardster.com or write an issue in the github repository:

https://github.com/snapcardster/omni-mtg/
